subject: Baseball
Apparel
lead_paragraph: Less than 24 hours after the Mets completed their historic collapse with a loss to the Florida Marlins, the only smiles in the club’s fan shops were on tourists and bobblehead dolls.
snippet: Less than 24 hours after the Mets completed their historic collapse with a loss to the Florida Marlins, the only smiles in the club’s fan shops were on tourists and bobblehead dolls.
